knimeNode.name: Team Statistics Query
knimeNode.shortDescription: Query team statistics using dropdown selections

intro.p: This node queries team statistics from the API-Sports API using dropdown-based selections instead of JSON input. Select a league, season, and team from the dropdown menus to build your query.

The node uses reference data from the Reference Data Loader to populate the dropdowns (note: current prototype version uses hardcoded major leagues). The output is a single-row table containing all team statistics fields.

ul.li: Port 0: Reference Data (from Reference Data Loader node)

fullDescription.option: Select the league for the team statistics query. Available options include major European leagues (Premier League, La Liga, Bundesliga, Serie A, Ligue 1).
Select the team to query. Teams shown are for the selected league. (Note: Current prototype shows major teams from Premier League by default)

ports.inPort: Reference data from Reference Data Loader node
API-Sports connection from the API-Sports Connector node
ports.outPort: Table with one row containing team statistics (complex fields as JSON strings)
